definition: twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
twenty (20), in a limited number of set expressions/also written using banker's character 念
the twenty-eight constellations/also written 二十八宿[er4 shi2 ba1 xiu4]
twenty four dynastic histories (or 25 or 26 in modern editions)/same as 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3]

sentences.english: It would strike twelve in twenty minutes time.
sentences.chinese: 還有廿分鐘它就該敲十二點了。

sentences.english: He was dying in the hospital when he celebrated his 22rd birthday.
sentences.chinese: 他在醫院慶祝他的廿二歲生日時正瀕臨死亡。

sentences.english: It was seven feet long and four feet wide, and it had twenty-two wheels.
sentences.chinese: 這輛馬車有七英尺長，四英尺寬，還有廿二個輪子。

sentences.english: Iwaki has set up its joint ventures in 27 countries all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 易威奇在全球廿七個國家和地區設有聯營公司。

sentences.english: U. S. President John F. Kennedy his inauguration, twenty centimeters thick snow.
sentences.chinese: 美國總統甘乃迪就職時，積雪厚達廿公分。

sentences.english: Can suppress the osteoclast to twenty absorptions.
sentences.chinese: 能抑制破骨細胞對廿的吸收。

sentences.english: Other groups saw their attention spans wane after 20 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 而另一組人的注意力則在廿分鐘過後逐漸走下坡。

sentences.english: The mother died at 29 years old, left three men and three women.
sentences.chinese: 母親死的時候才廿九歲，留下了三男三女。

definition: reign name of Qing emperor (1850-1861)/Xianfeng county in Enshi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Hubei
extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me
last ten days of the lunar month
reign name of penultimate Qing emperor Guangxu or Guang-hsu (1875-1908)
Li (c. 2000 BC), sixth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Ai 哀[Ai1]
